I am proud to have introduced the NAD Bank Pollution Solution Act with my San Diego Democratic Congressional Delegation, which will create more funding for infrastructure improvements to prevent transboundary sewage flows.

The sewage spills are unacceptable. I sent a letter to the International Boundary and Water Commission today, urging them to address our concerns with the recent spills and the amount of time it has taken to notify the public.

.@RepSusanDavis is an amazing colleague and friend. It has been a pleasure to serve alongside her. The 53rd Congressional District was well served by her tireless devotion to her constituents. Congress will not be the same without her. Enjoy your future endeavors, Susan! - Juan
Happy #LaborDay to all the hard working women and men who are the fabric of America. I will continue to work on behalf of workers in Congress to reaffirm that equal work deserves equal pay.

My thoughts are with the families of the victims of the #OdessaShooting. These atrocities should not be a weekly recurrence in our communities. It is time for the Senate to take up legislation to expand background checks in gun sales.
